title.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Oct. 8, 1922. The Bohemian Mothers' and Sisters' Society Issues a Call to Meeting

div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Oct. 8, 1922. THE BOHEMIAN MOTHERS' AND SISTERS' SOCIETY ISSUES A CALL TO MEETING

body.p: The Podporujici Spolek Vitezstvi Americke Vlajky (Victory of the American Flag Benevolent Society), consisting of mothers, wives, and sisters of men who served in the World War, requests all of its members to report at the regular meeting of the Spolek tomorrow October 9, 1922. It is necessary also that the correct addresses of all members be reported.
Sisters! Come one, come all! With a sisterly greeting and best wishes,
[Translator's note: The above call was published again in the October 9, 1922 issue of the Denni Hlasatel.]
